api kiyamu lesiyata "manthara kariyek" gana kiyala, manthara kariyek kiwwata aa kopi kale manthara kariyo wage warahali andum andagaththu maya kossak uda ahasin gaman giyapu kenek neweyi, aawa hama welema dakaganna hamba une papuwata hira wenna adapu printad ti shart ekakuyi, agata hira wenna andapu denim kalisamakuyi ekka thama, aa thawa aa athe hama welema tikak mila andika smat pon ekakuth dakinna labuna, aa ooni gamanak yanna pawichi kale bas eka thama, aata udin yannath puluwan athi,samahara wita aa udin yanna kamathi nathuwa athi, kohoma unath kathawata eeka wadak na, kathawa kiyana mama eeka danneth na, aa thawa ekak kiyanna amathaka una, aa manthara kariyek unata lassanayi, eka parak kawuru hari dakkoth aayimath harila balanna hithena widiye lassanak aata thibuna, anika issara manthara kariyo hitiye rawagana unata,dakina hama manussayath ekkama muna pura hinawena puruddak aata thibuna, ithin aa sasthara kiyanna, gurukan karanna issara kattiya wagee gas gal gane giye na, jiwitheta hoyanna bari pala, kangawena an ehema illuweth na, aa sastharayak kiyanna ooninam karanne age smat pon ekata hed set eka hayi karala kane gahaganna ekayi, eeta passe midiya pleyaren "ekon" ge hari "bibar" ge hari sinduwakata miniththu kipayak sawan dena aa patan gannawa sastharaya ahannage athithaya kiyanna, parana aya ara kiri gahata anna kiyala kiyanne,anna ee wage athithaya kiyala iwara karana aa ee langata patan gannawa anagathaya kiyanna, aa anagathaya kiyanne anik aya wage neweyi, eka anagathayak wenuwata aa anagathayan kihipayak kiyanawa, kaluth nathi, suduth nathi, kiyala aa kiyanawa kamathi anagathayak thoragana eeka dihawata gaman aarambha karanna kiyala, aa me kiyana sasthara walata mukuth illanna yanne na sasthara ahannangen, kohedi hari aawa dakkama owun muna pura hina wewi kiyala balaporoththu wenawa arenna, eeth bohoma aya agennam pon nambarayanam illa gannawa, aa gurukam karana widiya mama kiyanna yanne na eeken kathawata wadak nathi handa, eeth eekata laptop ekak sambandayi kiyala witharak mama kiyannam, onna dan thama hari kathawa patan ganne, aa dawasak bas eke gamanak yaddi hamu wechcha eka tharunayekuta ooni wenawa agen sastharayak ahanna, dan magen ahanna epa ohu kohomada aa manthara kariyek ya kiyala danagaththe kiyala, mama danne na, ohu kohoma hari dana gaththa, ithin aa purudu widiyata sasthare kiyanna patan gaththa, ithin athithaya kiyala iwara wela anagathaya kiyanna patan gannakota maha puduma deyak una, aa kawadawath kiyapu ekama sastharayakawath age gana thibune na, eeth menna me tharunayage anagathaye age gana kiyawuna, aa eeka me tharunayata kiyanna baya wuna, manthara kari sastharaya okkoma tharunayata kiwwa,habayi ee age nama thibunu kotasa ayin karala, sastharaya kiyala awasanayedi wena kagenwathma mukuthma noyillapu aa, ohugen pon nambare illa gannawa, ithin ee kathawe danata kiyanna puluwan hariya ochcharayi, ithuru tika aaranchi wunama kiyannam, habayi thawa manthara kari nohithapu deyak thiyanawa kiyanna, ee tharunayage anagathe manthara kari liyawenne age sastharaya nisama bawath, sastharaye aa gana kiyawenne anagathaya nisa bawath......
